long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a extension for integrating https://www.jobvision.ir/ and https://www.jobinja.ir job search websites into your PayamGostar CRM and syncing applied resumes with payamgostar crm application.
This extension makes reviewing applied resumes of job candidates easier and increases speed of hiring process.
